item.title: By: evertb
item.dc:creator: evertb
item.description: There is only a very small core of Angel Investors in Ireland and this "area" needs more attention. There is still lots off untapped private wealth out there and with the right stimulus and education these people can become a valuable Angel Investors resource.<br>We are planning a discussion/talk on this topic at the upcoming "Business Camp 09" in Limerick. Not just on how starting entrepreneurs can raise Angel investment but also to show potential investors the ins & outs of Angel Investment.<br>Details will be announced soon: <a href="http://bit.ly/19Hdih" rel="nofollow">http://bit.ly/19Hdih</a><br><br>Evert.
item.content:encoded:
There is only a very small core of Angel Investors in Ireland and this “area” needs more attention. There is still lots off untapped private wealth out there and with the right stimulus and education these people can become a valuable Angel Investors resource.
We are planning a discussion/talk on this topic at the upcoming “Business Camp 09″ in Limerick. Not just on how starting entrepreneurs can raise Angel investment but also to show potential investors the ins & outs of Angel Investment.
Details will be announced soon: http://bit.ly/19Hdih

Evert.

item.title: By: barryalistair
item.dc:creator: barryalistair
item.description: I was encouraged to hear about Halo Business Angel Network National Directorate which is being jointly funded between Enterprise Ireland and Intertrade - its mission, as umbrella to regional Halo networks, is to encourage angel investment for pre-screened investment opportunity.<br><br>It is being headed by Diane Roberts who many of you might know for her work in EI, and is officially launching in Dublin 16th September. <br><br>Regretably the website is not functional, so further info from <a href="mailto:info@hban.org" rel="nofollow">info@hban.org</a>.<br><br>Best<br>Barry<br><a href="http://IrishDev.com"/ rel="nofollow">http://IrishDev.com</a><br>News, Events and Jobs for the Irish Software Community
item.content:encoded:
I was encouraged to hear about Halo Business Angel Network National Directorate which is being jointly funded between Enterprise Ireland and Intertrade – its mission, as umbrella to regional Halo networks, is to encourage angel investment for pre-screened investment opportunity.

It is being headed by Diane Roberts who many of you might know for her work in EI, and is officially launching in Dublin 16th September.

Regretably the website is not functional, so further info from info@hban.org.

Best
Barry
http://IrishDev.com/
News, Events and Jobs for the Irish Software Community

item.title: By: davidquaid
item.dc:creator: davidquaid
item.description: Probably a good way to do this would be to publish some basic models or case studies showing the agreement or model used by the Business Angel and Startup could be reproduced by new Angels and other startups.
item.content:encoded: Probably a good way to do this would be to publish some basic models or case studies showing the agreement or model used by the Business Angel and Startup could be reproduced by new Angels and other startups.
